name: Daunting Dungeons
description:
I made this game in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41, it tries to combine a shooter with a dungeon crawler/ turnbased game and is randomly generated. there is a bug that text so score doesn't show in html version...

use the mouse to move the player

and right click the player to shoot bullets.

try to get the highest score, mine was 2250.
